experience.title: Research Intern
experience.description: Deep Learning Intern• Objective: to learn useful representations from a set of material microstructure images, that can lead to the efficient characterization of	microstructure  for use in establishing structure-property linkages in different material systems,	•A method to learn similarity metric based on Siamese neural network architecture and implemented by achieving the goal which then can be used to classify and cluster microstructures based on similarity into 7 classes.•Initialized the weights with the pre-trained VGG16 model and contrastive loss function in the Siamese network over CNN architecture to increase the accuracy from 95% to 97.6% for image dataset consisting of 2400 micrograph images• Improved the accuracy by using the triplet network and triplet loss which resulted in increased accuracy by 0.8%
experience.description_html: Deep Learning Intern• Objective: to learn useful representations from a set of material microstructure images, that can lead to the efficient characterization of microstructure for use in establishing structure-property linkages in different material systems, •A method to learn similarity metric based on Siamese neural network architecture and implemented by achieving the goal which then can be used to classify and cluster microstructures based on similarity into 7 classes.•Initialized the weights with the pre-trained VGG16 model and contrastive loss function in the Siamese network over CNN architecture to increase the accuracy from 95% to 97.6% for image dataset consisting of 2400 micrograph images• Improved the accuracy by using the triplet network and triplet loss which resulted in increased accuracy by 0.8%
